General.Name: TJ media Co. Ltd
General.Description: TJ media Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of karaoke systems in South Korea. The company offers commercial and home karaoke machines, microphone karaoke machines, music contents, batteries, chargers, and other peripherals and karaoke-related products. It also provides TV karaoke solutions, including IPTV and smartphone applications. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Hwasong Road 64 Gil 23, Seoul, South Korea

1.Name: Mr. Kyung-Jae  Lee
1.Title: MD, Head of R&D, Production Department and Director
